title: Valuable Property for Sale in Maharagama.
details:
6.2 Perches Land for Sale at Udahamulla, Maharagama walking distance to 119 bus road, About 250 meters. Highly residence land bordering to a paddy field.

The client if need to construct house, the necessary assistant will provide for this.

- Few mints walk to leading super markets, banks, financial institutions etc
- 30 mints drive to Southern Highway Express
- Good Wide Road access up to the property.
